author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind
category: advice-quotes, answers-to-prayers, calling-people, christian-living, christian-quotes, christianity-faith, despair, god, grateful-outlook, grateful-quotes, healing, hope-and-despair, hope-for-each-day, hope-quotes, inspirational-quotes, jesus-christ, joy-quotes, joyful-living-quotes, joyfulness, lord, obstacles-quotes, overcoming-adversity, peace, peace-quote, positive-quotes, prayer-quotes, praying-life, religious-faith, religious-quote, spiritual-life, spirituality, strength-and-courage, trust, trusting-god

quote: You’re hurt.”“No. No, I’m fine. It’s not blood. The militiamen were adjusting Sir Lewis’s trebuchet, and there was a mishap. You took a melon for me.” She smiled, even though her lips trembled.
author: Tessa Dare, A Lady by Midnight

quote: Trust is not an obsession, darling, it's an extension of love. When we truly love someone, we give them our heart to hold in their hands. And when that love is returned, that very trust is balm to our souls.
author: Julie Lessman, A Passion Redeemed

quote: You cannot trust yourself,’ she agreed, bed-rock calm. ‘Therefore, let go. Seize life and place trust in me.
author: Janny Wurts, Initiate's Trial

quote: Trust compared to a valuable stone that has been shattered, cannot be restored to its original form.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: Strangers were a fairytale full of possibilities not yet corrupted by reality while caregivers were the reality – and everything that couldn't be counted upon.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: I have no idea what you are doing...who you really are, but there's something about you that makes me think you are good for me." ~Raina
author: Sarah Brocious, The Awakening

quote: Maybe he was dangerous, but for some reason, she trusted him.
author: J.M. Darhower, Reignite

quote: Sacred blessings and divine opportunities appear in your life disguised as unforeseen changes and challenging circumstances.
author: Miya Yamanouchi
category: changes, divine, divine-quotes, embrace-change, new-life, opportunity, quotes-about-divinity, quotes-about-trust, spiritual-quotes, trust, universe

quote: When we are anxiously attached, our inability to trust the intentions and behaviors of others will often lead us to escalate situations and then reject attempts to reassure us. It is a painful and dramatic spiral.
author: Mary Crocker Cook, Awakening Hope. A Developmental, Behavioral, Biological Approach to Codependency Treatment.

quote: The moon splits open.We move through, waterbirds risingto look for another lake.Or say we are living in a love-ocean,where trust works to caulk our body-boat,to make it last a little while,until the inevitable shipwreck,the total marriage, the death-union.Dissolve in friendship,like two drunkards fighting.Do not look for justice herein the jungle where your animal soulgives you bad advice.Drink enough wine so that you stop talking.You are a lover, and love is a tavernwhere no one makes much sense.Even if the things you say are poemsas dense as sacks of Solomon's gold,they become pointless.
author: Jalaluddin Rumi, Bridge to the Soul: Journeys Into the Music and Silence of the Heart

quote: It was then that she realized she still had God. He was the only one who hadn't left her. He knew who she was, even if she didn't. A single tear formed in the corner of her eye as she thanked God for not abandoning her - especially when she needed Him most.
author: J.E.B. Spredemann, Amish by Accident
category: abandonment, alone, aloneness, amish, amish-by-accident, amish-fiction, amnesia, believe, christianity, comfort, faith, god, hope, hopelessness, need, nobody, security, spredemann, tears, trust

quote: A man who journeys in the desert finds a guide among the desert people, and he who journeys on the sea trusts seamen.
author: Marmaduke William Pickthall

quote: Avoiding awareness of our own reality is often an attempt to deny thoughts, desires, or intentions that we feel will threaten or contradict the needs of those with whom we feel strong attachment. We instinctively hide feelings and thoughts we assume would be threatening to other people, and might cause them to leave us. . . People who learned early in life to adapt to parental needs to an extent that we were unable to focus on our own developmental tasks and needs will often continue to play out this working mode” of conditional attachment. “You will attach to me as long as I meet your needs.
author: Mary Crocker Cook, Afraid to Let Go. for Parents of Adult Addicts and Alcoholics
category: attachment, awareness, codependency, intentions, parenting, trust

quote: Human beings are the most successful of animals because of their capability to learn, and an abused animal learns very quickly to defend itself. It also learns very quickly to trust very few people - if any.
author: Brad Thor, Black List
category: doctors, lifelessons, people, trust, trust-no-one, truthbomb

quote: I am glad that I can tell the truth, for lies are a form of theft; the liar steals from another person's trust. There are liars all over the world who have grown rich on the trust they have stolen.
author: Najaf Mazari

quote: When our caregivers are unavailable, most of time it has nothing to do with LOVE for the child, however, the child cannot possibly know this. The child winds up believing that the unavailable parent is not available due to some defect within the child. We believe that if we were “enough” the parent would CHOOSE to be available.
author: Mary Crocker Cook, Awakening Hope. a Developmental, Behavioral, Biological Approach to Codependency Treatment.

quote: To fully accept someone or something, means that you understand yourself enough to trust your own judgement and intuition, with this understanding full acceptance is inevitable and the next step possible.
author: Nityananda Das, Divine Union

quote: With intimacy comes the possibility of “engulfment” or being taken hostage by the demands of others. We may have distorted perceptions of the “demands” and obligations placed upon us by those who claim to love us. Trusting that love to be unconditional is almost impossible for us, and we are always scanning for the unstated “subtext” or hidden “agenda” connected to this love.
author: Mary Crocker Cook, Awakening Hope. a Developmental, Behavioral, Biological Approach to Codependency Treatment.

quote: This is my present, also yours, free to choose. I am here at your side, alive, and no ghost. Let beauty and care forge the weapons tonight.
author: Janny Wurts, Initiate's Trial

quote: Along with our over-giving is our own conditional giving pattern, which can fuel so much of our resentment and feelings of “victimization” by the people to whom we are giving. We may be completely unaware of our expectations of those we assist, and our own anger and resentment may catch us off guard. This is why our martyrdom is so hard on those around us. They are aware of the price we are exacting, even when we are in denial about our own motives and expectations.
author: Mary Crocker Cook, Awakening Hope. A Developmental, Behavioral, Biological Approach to Codependency Treatment.

quote: Don't Trust BlindlyIf in shark infested waters, don't assume the fin coming toward you is a dolphin.
author: Mary Russel

quote: Things often have a 50/50 chance of going our way or the other, trust that you will be able to handle the disappointment, change, discomfort and treat it all as an adventure.
author: Malti Bhojwani, The Mind Spa Ignite Your Inner Life Coach

quote: Forgive me that I felt forsaken, That grief and angst was all I knew. Forgive me that I kept mistaking Too many other men for you.
author: Anna Akhmatova, White Flock

quote: All of life is a trust fall, and I'm awakening to the thrill, rather than the fear, of being suspended midair.
author: Leigh Ann Henion, Phenomenal: A Hesitant Adventurer's Search for Wonder in the Natural World
category: adventure, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, travel, trust

quote: Believe what you see with your eyes
author: trust what you hear with your ears
category: know what you feel with your flesh. The rest is dream and delusion.

quote: If you are holding hands with others, you can't hold a gun!
author: Allan Rufus
category: better-world, gun, holding-hands, love, peace, people, together, trust, unity, unity-of-all-people

quote: Ignorance breeds fear. Tell people the truth. Trust them to keep their heads.
author: Olivia Manning, The Danger Tree

quote: Trust those you love, and that love you in return," she said. "It will hurt more if they betray you, but at least you'll still know joy." - Zusa
author: David Dalglish, A Dance of Shadows

quote: It's not God who doesn't care, it's us
author: Frank Warren
category: blindness-of-man, god, lies, love, religion, trust, truth

quote: CHERISH a heart like you'd carry an egg, cause when it drops it becomes pieces of shell, never to be MENDED
author: Poise

quote: Instead of overly seeking to get more 'likes' and 'followers' on social media seek to build trust and more meaningful, lasting relationships.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: In the end, it's only a story of having had her words and secrets, her confidences, turned against her by someone she once believed entirely beyond any acts of betrayal. A story of pettiness and cruelty and of the lies friends will tell when a friendship has ceased to be profitable or convenient. It is a very simple and inexpressibly complex story of cowardice...
author: Caitlín R. Kiernan

quote: Faith and doubt cannot reside together. An iota of doubt is enough to taint the entire process, it is like a drop of red ink in water.
author: Malti Bhojwani, The Mind Spa Ignite Your Inner Life Coach

quote: We'd seen it a million times before, since girls on the Tracks rarely knew of loyalty. She'd be gone when the breeze got under her skin. "You can't trust Vagabond hearts. They are already so broken that they think nothing of breaking yours," he had explained once. I wondered who was the first to break his heart–where he'd gained that knowledge the first time around.
author: J.D. Brewer, Vagabond
category: broken-hearts, loyalty, the-tracks, trains, trust, vagabond, vagabond-hearts, vagabonds

quote: Trust is like sand, one lie and it slips away.
author: Saru Singhal

quote: This is a trust that you just cannot find in modern society for there are no conditions to forge it.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: Believe what you see with your eyes, trust what you hear with your ears; know what you feel with your flesh. The rest is dream and delusion.
author: Brian Staveley, The Emperor's Blades

quote: A benefit of friendship is knowing whom to tell secrets to.
author: Alessandro Manzoni
category: friend, friendship, friendship-true-and-loyal, inspirational, secrets, trust, trustworthy

quote: Friendship makes you feel as one with your friend.
author: Thomas Aquinas
category: best-friend, friend, friendship, inspirational, true, true-friend, trust, trustworthy, truth

quote: You don’t let many people behind that wall of yours do you?” “No I don’t because basically people are shit. They have let me down over and over so now I choose them very carefully.”“You have let Yvan in,” he pointed out. “Yvan’s different.
author: Amy Kuivalainen, Cry of the Firebird

quote: Even if you communicate sincerely and your intentions are upright, if people don’t have trust, they speculate your every move...
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Better to find your own way than to blindly trust the words of others, whoever they are.
author: Gemma Malley, The Resistance

quote: When people don't trust you, they may walk with you but they second guess every step you take- don't believe what you say is what you mean...
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Sometimes what you see is not real, and the reality is not what you see. Somewhere between both these reasoning resides a fact: where there is a lack of trust and confidence, perception will always differ with reality.
author: Ashish Patel
category: confidence-and-attitude, lack-of-trust, perception, reality-of-life, trust, trustworthy

quote: I need you both to trust me," Vincent said. "I don't mean that I would like you to trust me. I mean that I need you to trust me.
author: Michael  Grant, BZRK

quote: You can't band together to fight without trust. And without trust, there was no hope.
author: Rick Yancey

quote: Honour bought of coin is but grass in the wind. When the wind blows south it leans south
author: when the wind blows north so does it lean. Hardly solid rock upon which to forge sturdy trust nor imperishable friendship

quote: I have been learning a great deal about the need to let go of our fears and truly trust the Lord. When we hold on to fear we let false beliefs (and Satan) be in control. When we trust, we give the control back to God. When we give Him the control we open up our connection to Him so that He can inspire us with the actions we need to take to receive the blessings we desire. I think it comes down to believe, listen, trust, and act. Faith is the ability to believe something enough that you are to act upon the belief. Do I believe God when He says everything will be OK? Do I believe Him enough to trust Him and am I willing to give Him the control and listen to His prompting to do things that He says will make my situation better?
author: Laura   Lane, Two Mothers, One Prayer: Facing your Child's Cancer with Hope, Strength, and Courage
category: act, believe, connection, faith, fear, god, inspire, listen, trust

quote: Many people desire to be trusted but they don’t do things that make them trustworthy...
author: Assegid Habtewold

quote: Paradise is no whim.It takes time and trust,You see.
author: Scott Hastie
category: faith, paradise, poetry, see, time, trust, truth, whim, wisdom, wise

quote: Faith is confident trust in God and the salvation He provides in His Son Jesus Christ.
author: Jim George
category: christ, christianity, confident, god, jesus, jim-george, son, trust

quote: i remind myself every morning, commitment is a big part of trustworthy, what i am and what i believe
author: irak.ibrahim hussain didi

quote: I want you to judge me without thinking about it.I want you to give me advice without considering my opinion.I want you to expecting anything without the need to trust me.I want you to decide for me with all the care in the world.I want you to help me without smothering me.I want you to decide without seeing my point of view.I want you to hug me without holding me...I want you to feel protected in my presence without me having to lie.I want you to be close without suffocating me.I want you to know everything without knowing anything...I want you to know that both love and friendship should always be Unconditional.
author: Stefan  Dimov
category: closeness, decision-making, editing, friendship, jorge-bucay, love, opinions, poem, poems, poetry, point-of-view, protection, rewriting, thinking, trust, unconditional-love

quote: In the 4th Wave, you can't trust that people are still people. But you can trust that your gun is still your gun.
author: Rick Yancey, The 5th Wave

quote: Don't be so impatient in finding love
author: take your time & allow the Lord to write that special love story for you. Otherwise you'll be busy reading the back of the book.

quote: A business fails when motive becomes more important than the trust.
author: Thiruman Archunan

quote: In those stories, one is often asked to do something unimaginably terrible to the creature. Cut off it's head, say. A test. Not a test of love. A test of trust. Trust lifts the spell.
author: Holly Black, Ironside

quote: Intentions, whether good or bad, that don’t reflect the words and actions are only meant to fulfill personal goals.
author: Ashish Patel
category: bad-intentions, intentions, judgement, negative-intentions, personal-goals, trust, wrong-intentions

quote: Trust allows. Not trusting obstructs.
author: Peter Santos, Everything I Wanted To Know About Spirituality But Didn't Know How To Ask: A Spiritual Seekers Guidebook

quote: Unto the Cross came death, and unto death came the Cross.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: believe, bible, choice, christianity, crucifixion, death, faith, gift, god, holy-spirit, hope, jesus, life, light-of-the-world, love, resurrection, salvation, sin, trust, truth, wages-of-sin-is-death

quote: A friend in deed is a friend indeed.
author: Ashok  Kallarakkal
category: action, ashok, curiosity-kills-the-katha, deeds, friendship, kallarakkal, palette-of-love, trust

quote: Marketing effectively, in a semantic web, revolves around those three ‘little’ requirements: Trust, Authority, Reputation.
author: David Amerland, SEO Help: 20 Semantic Search Steps that Will Help Your Business Grow

quote: Faith is such a wonderful thing. Without it, we would be panicky when we feel like we're standing alone and when the things we need and yearn for seem to be beyond our reach.
author: Ron Brackin

quote: When people misuse a text with "Did God really say...?" to shut down someone's honest wrestling with God, they betray what seems to be their own lack of faith and humility. We ought not to be threatened by someone's searching. We ought not to try to control the outcomes in another's journey. We ought not to resort to using shame or fear or guilt to ensure others share our certainties. God can be trusted to lead those who question and struggle through prayer, his Word, their minds, and their experiences. Let's focus on encouraging one another rather than accusing and condemning one another.
author: Wendy Vanderwal-Gritter, Generous Spaciousness: Responding to Gay Christians in the Church

quote: Discernment is trust put into practice.
author: Peter Santos, Everything I Wanted To Know About Spirituality But Didn't Know How To Ask: A Spiritual Seekers Guidebook

quote: Quit hating and trying to be like the next man. Get on your own grind & be better than the next man, whether you gotta hustle, work a job or whatever just do you.
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, god, happy, hustle, loyalty, making-money, men, money, outcome, pain, poor, relationships, respect, responsibility, richness, sadness, strong, struggle, trust, woman, women

quote: There is no comparison between a girl and a boy, his importance, priorities, his freedom, his value and much more in this world, everything related to a boy is much more important than a girl and it doesn't matter how much a girl is educated or trustworthy a girl is a girl and a boy is a boy, I wish that at least every man should have a little trust on a girl and give her freedom to choose her own lifestyle... I believe in it that if you show your support for her she will surely never make your head down.
author: -muneeza

quote: I have long seen my spirituality as personal, to the degree that I harbor a slight mistrust for anyone who practices similarly. It is as though they are admitting to have on the same cut and color of underwear I do. It may be true, but I don't like to share these details with strangers.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Pagan Standard Times: Essays on the Craft

quote: Quit hating and trying be like the next man. Get on your own grind & be better than the next man, whether you gotta hustle, work a job or whatever just do you.
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, god, happy, hustle, loyalty, making-money, men, money, outcome, pain, poor, relationships, respect, responsibility, richness, sadness, strong, struggle, trust, woman, women

quote: I never trust a man who tucks in his shirt by choice or neglects coffee in favor of tea.
author: Brian D'Ambrosio

quote: ...we named her Dorothy Ann. Dolly, for short. I kissed her warily, fearful of the pain of loving her, love her, though love her I did; fearful lest she hurt me by dying.
author: Nancy E. Turner, My Name Is Resolute

quote: Love should not cause suffocation and death if it is truly love. Don't bundle someone into an uncomfortable cage just because you want to ensure their safety in your life. The bird knows where it belongs, and will never fly to a wrong nest.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: anxiety, attachment, attention, belong, betrayal, bird, cage, care, clingy, death, discomfort, disturbance, domineering, fidelity, fly, honesty, infidelity, insecure, insecurity, life, love, loyalty, nest, panic, protection, safety, security, suffocation, tired, too-much, true-love, trust, undue-attachment, wrong

quote: On either side of a potentially violent conflict, an opportunity exists to exercise compassion and diminish fear based on recognition of each other's humanity. Without such recognition, fear fueled by uninformed assumptions, cultural prejudice, desperation to meet basic human needs, or the panicked uncertainty of the moment explodes into violence.
author: Aberjhani, Splendid Literarium: A Treasury of Stories, Aphorisms, Poems, and Essays
category: aberjhani, antiracism, assumptions, charter-for-compassion, compassion, compassion-action-network, compassion-heals-lives, cultural-differences, cultural-diversity, desperation, fear, global-community, humanity, militarization, military-conflict, nonviolence, nonviolent-conflict-resolution, opportunity-quotes, overcoming-fear, panic, peacism, polarization, police-reform, police-shootings, political-philosophy, prejudice, slpendid-literarium, stop-killing-each-other, terrorism, terrorists, trust, uncertainty, waging-peace, war, xenophobia

quote: Never believe the beautiful. Trust me on this.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading
category: beautiful, beliefs, liars, lies, trust, trustworthy, truths

quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
author: Jennifer Rush, Reborn

quote: Promises hold no real value, What matters the most is not to loose yourself while fulfilling promises for others.
author: Alamvusha

quote: I don't trust people. The good part is, i don't really have to. I've surrendered my faith to the Higher power, and it's unconditional love for me. Who am i to question it's motives? Even if there are things i can't understand. This is why there's no need to trust people - if they are on my path, it means they are good for me.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic
category: divine-love, divinity, faith, love, spiritual-growth, spirituality, trust, trusting-god

quote: Some people will only "love u " as much as they can use u. their loyalty end's where the benefits stop
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, games, god, happy, loyalty, making-money, men, money, outcome, pain, poor, relationships, respect, responsibility, richness, sadness, strong, struggle, trust, woman, women

quote: Yet he hadn’t asked for anything that he hadn’t been willing to give himself. - Mahri
author: Kathryne Kennedy, Beneath the Thirteen Moons
category: assurance, being-bound, equality, letting-go, love, marriage, marriage-equality, need, tieng-the-knot, trust

quote: Remember that when God calls us to leave behind something, it means He has something better in store for us. Allow Him to replace the old with the new today!
author: Paige Omartian
category: better, faith, god, inspirational, trust, wake-up

quote: We can have traders, without them being traitors.We can trade, without trading others.We can trade our traits, and not our worst ones, with others.We can trade our traitors for better traders, or they can become better traders themselves.Let the market trade this way.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau
category: absolute-productivity, acheivement, backstabbers, economic-philosophy, equity, fairness, money, national-acclaim, national-mastery, trade, traitors, trust

quote: i see when you doubt yourself, i feel your fear. please put down your burden and remember i am here. -your angels.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: angels, awaken, believe, faith, journey, love, peace, quotes-about-life, spiritual, trust

quote: Real Men can commit to 1 person. Only boys are "Players", pimps usually get lock up or die at the end of movies, & dogs catch fleas!
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, god-s-will, happy, loyalty, making-money, men, money, outcome, pain, poor, relationships, respect, responsibility, richness, sadness, strong, struggle, trust, woman, women

quote: Most of life’s big steps require a certain muddling through, a trusting that no one really knows the magical formula for the big firsts in life [Cram, Cusi, "‘One Life to Live’ and 14 Beautiful Boys to Kiss," Cafe, January 14, 2015].
author: Cusi Cram

quote: We all can have accidents in life. God knew this, and so He sent Jesus as our Healer. His healing touch is God’s mercy to us. If you are hurt, ask God to heal you and then trust Him to do it in His way and in His time.
author: Stormie Omartian, Just Enough Light for the Step I'm On

quote: The question you’ll need to ask yourself as your heart is filled with fear is: “Do you know God’s heart?” Do you know Him that intimately? Do you trust Him with all of your heart, instead of leaning unto your own understanding? Most of us don’t, especially when life is falling apart at the seams. If you want to know God’s heart, if you want to trust Him and have the kind of peace that comes with that, you’re going to have to read His word. The Bible is His voice and it reveals His character.
author: Cherie Hill, When You Need a Miracle: The Seven Secrets of Faith

quote: If I didn't work on the assumption that people were mostly telling me the truth, I think I'd go mad... And I'd rather be mistaken about others than mistrustful of them.
author: Una McCormack

quote: Dear my brothers there is no more room for wanting to be a thug, BUT there is PLENTY of room for being a father, lawyer, doctor and a teacher. Please take this in consideration!
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, brotherhood, god, happy, loyalty, making-money, men, money, outcome, pain, poor, relationships, respect, responsibility, richness, sadness, strong, struggle, trust, woman, women

quote: God doesn't ask us to understand, but He does ask us to trust.
author: Kristen McNulty, Closed Doors

quote: Woodcourt: “Miss Summerson,” said Mr. Woodcourt, “if without obtruding myself on your confidence I may remain near you, pray let me do so.”Esther: “You are truly kind,” I answered. “I need wish to keep no secret of my own from you; if I keep any, it is another’s.”Woodcourt: “I quite understand. Trust me, I will remain near you only so long as I can fully respect it.”Esther: “I trust implicitly to you,” I said, “I know and deeply feel how sacredly you keep your promise.” - pg.807
author: Charles Dickens, Bleak House

quote: In the quiet moments, listen to your heart; where it wanders is where your truth lays.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: believe, heart, intution, love, trust, truth

quote: In order to deceive others, it is necessary also to deceive oneself. The actor playing Hamlet must indeed believe that he is the Prince of Denmark, though when he leaves the stage he will usually remember who he really is. On the other hand, when someone's entire life is based on pretense, they will seldom if ever return to reality. That is the secret of successful politicians, evangelists and confidence tricksters—they believe that they are telling the truth, even when they know that they have faked the evidence. Sincerity, my dear Julia, is a quality not to be trusted.
author: Sarah Caudwell, The Sibyl in Her Grave
category: deceit, deception, evangelists, politicians, sincerity, trust

quote: Why should I be afraid to trust myself to you? I am not afraid, I have been well brought forward by you...
author: Walt Whitman, Leaves of Grass

quote: Everything you want lies on the other side of learning to trust yourself. Take a chance. Have faith. You already know who you are, what you want, and where you want to go.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Trust is the bridge from yesterday to tomorrow, built with planks of thanks.
author: Ann Voskamp, One Thousand Gifts: A Dare to Live Fully Right Where You Are

quote: On the front end it (Sabbath) hurts. Leaving my to-do lists alone. Trusting the universe will continue its forward motion without my intervention. Demonstrating that it is God who sustains me and not my own efforts. Sabbath is like the scary free fall of faith, in microcosm. And it is good for our hearts to practice. It gets easier.
author: Marcia Lebhar

quote: God dealt with our whole situation on the cross; there is nothing left for you to settle. Just say to Him, "Lord, I cannot forgive and I will no longer try to do it; but I trust that You in me will do it. I can't forgive and love; but I trust that You will forgive and love in my place and that You will do these things in me.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: The illusionists of quantity are performing sleights of hand wherever it concerns the topic of quality. A profession that went from being second in command under the throne, to outsourced to the cheapest external providers, is perhaps one of greatest conflicts of interest society faces today, not to mention the blatant disrespect of the people quality is intended for in the first place.Quality is about ascertaining the absolute best, for the sake of all involved. It therefore, is a lofty profession combining research, science, and morality to make the best judgements for today based on the history of the past in order to most adequately prepare for an ever oncoming future. Most importantly, quality removes personal preference that is not in the best interest of all people. Thus, anyone who would launch a war on quality can be considered an enemy of mankind, as they are would be purveyors of an ultimate breach of trust and security.Until the concept of quality is reinstituted as the governing advisor in all aspects of society, sychophants will chant "more" is "better". They will sell mediocrity at top dollar, and make top profits. Mediocrity should not be the accepted, celebrated standard, it should be the rudimentary blueprint for the greatest rollouts of progress ever marked in human history.
author: Justin Kyle McFarlane Beau
category: assurance, breach-or-trust, conflict-of-interest, mediocrity, progress, quality, quanitity, trust

quote: What God knows about me is more important than what others think about me.
author: Surgeo Bell
category: advice, blessings, god, god-s-will, happy, loyalty, men, outcome, pain, relationships, respect, responsibility, sadness, strong, trust, women

quote: When it comes to personal relationships, there is no greater way to express your commitment or to display your trustwor- thiness than to devote your life to the people you love.
author: Leon Hayduchok

quote: But Marchent, most journalists can’t be trusted. You do know that, don’t you?
author: Anne Rice, The Wolf Gift

quote: In relationships... there are no failures. Just experiences.
author: Des Coroy, 21st Century Relationship Guide

quote: Open collaboration encourages greater accountability, which in turn fosters trust.
author: Ron Garan, The Orbital Perspective: Lessons in Seeing the Big Picture from a Journey of 71 Million Miles
category: accountability, astronaut, collaboration, ron-garan, space, trust

quote: Trust is the main part of any kind of love, if you lost it then you must be failed it.
author: Sudeb Gharami

quote: I hear something in her words that's right, but it's hard to believe her right now.
author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant

quote: The things that challenge our trust in God also, challenge our confidence within ourselves.
author: Ellen J. Barrier
category: challenges, confidence, faith, god, hope, trust

quote: Trust is nothing when you have it. It's bread and milk. Basic. There's no glamour, no emotion, no drama - you just trust and that's it. Trusting someone is boring. It's a non-event. But take it away - try living without trust and suddenly your relationship is plunged into a living hellhole.
author: Kate Kerrigan, Recipes for a Perfect Marriage

quote: Miracles come from love. Miracles come from a seed of hope, a glimpse, a vision of something beautiful that makes our heart sing, something we can fall in love with so much that we are willing to trust and listen to inspiration. We can act on what we have been guided or led to do. That is when miracles happen; that is faith.
author: Laura   Lane, Two Mothers, One Prayer: Facing your Child's Cancer with Hope, Strength, and Courage
category: faith, heart, hope, inspiration, listen, love, miracles, trust, vision

quote: She hated him – she hated everything he stood for. But when they said hate is akin to love they were certainly right. Because she needed him with every fibre of her being. And hard as it was to admit it, that need was only part of what she felt for him. The whole was love – a love which recognised how wrong he was for her, but still clung to him. To everything about him.
author: Emily Arden, Lie to me: Deception: Book Two
category: conflict, deception, hate, love, need, relationship, romance, trust

quote: Sometimes it's better to pretend as if you know nothing. The vast majority of people can't be trusted, but in God I trust.
author: S.Z.J. Mtshali

quote: What do you want from me?" he asked hesitantly."Your trust," i answered without any hesitation.
author: Sarah Brocious, More Than Scars

quote: There are greater things than want and lust, Nerissa," he whispered. "I can't afford those things.
author: Sarah Brocious, More Than Scars

quote: When I said yes,it implies till death,and forever thence.When I said love,it connotes trust,allied in situations tough.And today,when I hold your hand,I am prepared to stand,any trouble,any avalanche.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
category: hand, life, love, love-story, lovers, marriage, marriage-proposal, platonic-love, promise, promise-keeper, trust, wedding-night, yes

quote: A little government and a little luck are necessary in life, but only a fool trusts either of them.
author: P.J. O'Rourke, Parliament of Whores: A Lone Humorist Attempts to Explain the Entire U.S. Government

quote: The tendency to trust easily anyone gives way to a certain vulnerability.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Presenting a humble façade gains trust; flattery appeals to ego; combine the two to gain an ego-based trust within someone, and you will find in your hands a judgement clouding tool second only to love.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: ego, ego-based-trust, façade, flattery, front, humility, judgement, judgment, love, manipulation, persuasion, trust

quote: If the Lord Jehovah makes us wait, let us do so with our whole hearts; for blessed are all they that wait for Him. He is worth waiting for. The waiting itself is beneficial to us: it tries faith, exercises patience, trains submission, and endears the blessing when it comes. The Lord’s people have always been a waiting people.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Trust is always a risk, but when placed in the right people after a trial period where they prove themselves worthy of it, it is a reward transcendent of all the emotional mire that bogs down a person’s potential.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: battles, emotions, fear, focus, free, freedom, hopeless, insecurity, love, mire, others, people, perspective, potential, proof, relationships, repair, reward, risk, tolerance, trial, trust, understanding, worthiness

quote: you will never know how valuable a thing or a person is...until its not with you anymore,then you`ll regret...its not my fault.its urs..
author: aismj

quote: Where there is desire, the means to fulfill it are endless.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: careful, desire, distrust, ethics, execution, greed, lust, means-to-an-end, morality, morals, motives, trust

quote: Never trust a person whose smile doesn't reach their eyes, chances are they do similar thing when they "cry" - Just be sure you have that OSCAR ready next time they do this
author: Paul Isaacs

quote: Trust your heart, and the answer will always become clear.
author: Robbie Vorhaus, One Less. One More.

quote: The throbbing habits of assumption tinted with malice lead to decisions and actions that drum out faith, trust and respect towards a crashing carelessness and uselessness. Be effective by discarding sneaking suspicions.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Admiration provides no saving grace for the inconvenient.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: This mix of love and hate, this blend of trust and hurt I have for him is so confusing even I can't understand it.He leaves, and I break.
author: Tammy Faith, Broken Heart

quote: ... if one is to rely on human judges, it is very important that they never admit to error.
author: David S. Landes, Revolution in Time: Clocks and the Making of the Modern World

quote: In times of war, skepticism can be just cause for execution.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: actions, careful, caution, death, distrust, execution, insecurity, love, others, people, relationships, skepticism, trust, war

quote: I don't know what love is,But i know what true love is,It is when two people encourages each other to grow ,Who will let you go out the world and trust that you will come back. This is what true love is about.
author: Lyza Matociños
category: come-back, encourages, grow, love, people, true-love, trust, world

quote: This life is like a game, so you better play it right!
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
category: fame, inspirational, jonathan-anthony-burkett, life, money, quotes, survival, trust, truth

quote: Your track record, and great achievements may prompt people to invest their resources such as time and money, not their heart.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Never share your most important secret with a person in deep love, for the partner will get to hear of it." -Oppong Amankwaa
author: Oppong Amankwaa

quote: The Israelites in the desert found that hoarded manna rotted. They were permitted no bank accounts and no insurance policies. God is enough. He will be tomorrow who he was today. Later, through Jeremiah (Jeremiah 2:13) God chastises Israel for digging cisterns next to streams of living water, hedging their bets just in case God forgets to be God...or neglects to be good. God is enough. Will he not be tomorrow who he has been today?
author: Marcia Lebhar

quote: A leaf does not resist the breeze. A goose does not resist the urge to fly down south. Is this not happiness? Is this not freedom? To access this incredible state, we need only one thing: Trust. Trust that, when you are not holding yourself together so tightly, you will not fall apart. Trust that it is more important to fulfill your authentic desires than listen to your fears. Trust that your intuition is leading you somewhere. Trust that the flow of life contains you, is bigger than you, and will take care of you - if you let it.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: authentic-desire, fear, let-go, letting-go, resistance, self-trust, trust, trust-yourself, trusting

quote: If a man cries in front of you, it doesn't mean he's weak. It means that he trusts you enough to let his guard down.
author: Faraaz Kazi, Truly, Madly, Deeply
category: love, men, sad, sad-love, tragic, true-love, trust

quote: Strange, how being left out of a secret always feels like a betrayal of trust.
author: Robin Hobb, Golden Fool

quote: And is this not the very reason for the establishment of the State? If there were cause and reason for confidence among individuals, the State would never have come into existence. The sacred and essential foundation for the State is our mutual and well-founded suspicion of each other. Anyone questioning this foundation throws suspicion upon the State.
author: Karin Boye, Kallocain

quote: When someone reacts violently and aggressively, it only goes to demonstrate the lack of truth, trust and confidence in oneself and issue that we are defending. It rather portrays the guilt, shame and self anger for defending the indefensible.
author: Vishwas Chavan
category: aggressiveness, angry, confidence, fear, trust, truth, vishwasutras

quote: Fly blindly, trust is full of magic. Let your wild voice guide the way.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: be-wild, be-yourself, inner-guidance, inner-voice, magic, trust, trust-yourself, wild

quote: We would not be who we are today if it had not been for the lives that we have lived.
author: Desmond Bournon
category: change-your-life, honesty, life, love, loyalty, relationships, trust

quote: But what I knew then was that nobody-- not even my mother-- was to be trusted in a strange world that showed very little of itself on the surface.
author: Robertson Davies

quote: Faith for Jesus is the opposite of anxiety. If you are anxious, if you are trying to control everything, if you are worried about many things, you don’t have faith, according to Jesus. You do not trust that God is good and on your side. You’re trying to do it all yourself, lift yourself up by your own bootstraps.
author: Richard Rohr

quote: There were so many things going on inside me and on the outside—many beyond my control. However, one thing I could control was to pray and commit myself every day to trust God so He could guide me.”—Yilda B. Rivera, Courage Under Fire
author: Yilda B. Rivera, Courage Under Fire

quote: far far away, on d moon;a promise was written;seasons will come n go,but i wont change, i will be the same,and I am on the way.But while counting the stars she lost the moon.
author: Harihar D. Naik

quote: Rylan grabbed the seat of her chair and moved it to the side where Kade was sitting. She pulled one hand from his lap and squeezed it between hers. “You’ve got to have a little faith in me.
author: Courtney Giardina, Holding on to Georgia

quote: Tiny is saying, "If you can't trust your gut then what can you trust?" And I say, "You can trust that caring, as a rule, ends poorly," which is true. Caring doesn't sometimes lead to misery. It always does.
author: John Green, Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Faith can move Mountains but DETERMINATION can help you build new ones.
author: Nikita Dudani
category: determination, faith, god, life, spiritual-quotes, spirituality, trust

quote: Why should I trust you?” Her eyes narrowed. “All I really know about you is that you’re not loyal to your girlfriends, you treat one-night stands like crap, and apparently you’ve made quite a name for yourself not only in the business world, but also in the bedroom since we last met.
author: Zoe Forward, Protecting His Witch

quote: Perhaps trust had to be accompanied by a measure of common sense, and a hefty dose of realism about human nature. But that would need a lot of thinking about, and the tea break did not go on forever.
author: Alexander McCall Smith, The Good Husband of Zebra Drive

quote: My dad had always said to not trust something unless it’s taken a tumble in the dirt. He’d meant it for people, and for things. Shiny and new didn’t exist for humankind any more.
author: Katherine McIntyre, Snatched
category: dystopian, humankind, new, post-apocalypse, post-apocalyptic, trust

quote: PROMISING, VOWING...cannot earn us trust. Trust can't be generated overnight. No SHORT CUT! It takes DOING over a very long period of time.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership
category: doing, overnight, promising, short-cut, trust, vowing

quote: To forgive' is divine they say, and 'to forget', attracts blessings, but to go a step further, and learn a lesson from a bad encounter/ experience is an act of wisdom;and promise oneself that you will never allow yourself to be exposed to such a thing or a person or even an idea again.
author: Henrietta Newton Martin
category: divine, faith, forget-wrongs, forgiveness, love, to-forgive, trust, truth, wisdom

quote: Hope and trust are beautiful things. One gives a person the will to live, the other makes it worth living.
author: Jacob Gralnick, Subterranean

quote: Better the devils you know than the one you don't.
author: Janet Mullany, Jane and the Damned

quote: The seeker might aim to hide too, make sure the person you are waiting for is trustworthy if not there will be no one looking for you.
author: Jasmine Kiyani

quote: It may not of happened the way you thought it would, but in the long run it will work out as it should.
author: Chris Burkmenn
category: believe, dreams, faith, goals, god, grace, hope, jesus, love, obedience, obey, plan, purpose, trust, work

quote: When someone hurts you time and time again, accept the fact that they don't care about you. Its a tough pill to swallow, but its necessary medicine.
author: Melchor Lim
category: acceptance, betrayal, denial, hurt, hurting, hurting-me, hurting-you, relationships, trust

quote: I may have trust issues, but some people seem to have an issue with the responsibility of being trusted.
author: Melchor Lim

quote: When it comes to loving D/ s relationships, the three little words mostly likely to have a significant , positive, and lasting impact on your partner’s well-being is probably “I love you.” Once we venture beyond that simple three-word endearment, however, the competition gets much stiffer. If I had to predict a winner in the four little words category, I’d choose “I believe in you.” When a Dominant believes in his submissive, she eventually grows to believe in herself. That sort of empowerment is priceless beyond measure, and almost always bears sweet fruit.
author: Michael Makai, The Warrior Princess Submissive

quote: Introverts need to trust their gut and share their ideas as powerfully as they can.
author: Susan Cain, Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking

quote: Trust, is the stone thrown into the sea, sinking deep in all its murkiness, unable to see what it once lived and believed to be a promise.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: believed, blinded, broken-promises, confidence, dirty, disappointment, expectation, fooled, obscurity, pain, promises, sea, see, sinking, sureness, trust

quote: Each betrayal begins with trust.
author: Phish, Phish - Farmhouse

quote: To be trusted is to be entrusted.
author: Paul Enenche

quote: When trauma involves intentional harm, such as in a crime or abuse, trust can totally collapse.
author: Dena Rosenbloom, Life After Trauma: A Workbook for Healing
category: abuse, betrayal, broken-trust, collapse, harm, hurt, incest, intentional-harm, trauma, trust

quote: The realization was becoming clearer: How could she expect others to trust her with the intricacies of their lives if she was not not willing to reveal hers?
author: Sarah E. Ladd, A Lady at Willowgrove Hall

quote: And yet, it was still a performance. Odin and I both knew it. It was a kind of play, a dream of how things might have been if he and I had been capable of trusting each other for a change. And so we hunted, and sang, and laughed, and told heavily edited stories of the good old days, while each of us watched the other and wondered when the knife would fall.
author: Joanne Harris
category: loki, norse-mythology, nostalgia, odin, sadness, suspicion, trust

quote: Trust can be broken in just a few seconds, but it takes years to heal
author: Rei Anthony Albon

quote: I can't believe that's true. Why would Giacomo fall for someone like me? (Simona)Because you've given him what other women haven't. You've given him your trust and honesty. (Leena)
author: Grace Kagni, Giacomo's Patience

quote: Trust becomes the only road home, back to love.
author: Geoffrey Wood, Leaper: The Misadventures of a Not-Necessarily-Super Hero

quote: In a nutshell, the difference between Christianity and all other belief systems is who you're putting your trust in: in Christ, or in yourself?
author: Ibrahim Emile

quote: The only thing I knew for sure is I hadn’t slept in ten years. Not really. I’d been fighting my own monster since nine months after 9/11. I had regrets. I had pain that I still can’t find words to describe. But sooner or later you have to make a choice. Maybe fate or luck or God had a plan for me in Jakarta that was greater than an educational leadership conference, a few papers and a book deal. If Vietnam was for Dad, then maybe Jakarta was for me. Indira says I shouldn’t discount that it was Allah’s plan. The way I see it, Allah’s plan is what started my war.
author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season
category: education, jakarta, military, poverty, students, teachers, trust, vietnam, war

quote: Trust can be broken in just a few seconds, but it will only heal after years
author: Rei Anthony Albon

quote: You must trust in your inner being of light, the angel you already are.
author: Sean Patrick Brennan, The Papal Visitor

quote: There is a mathematics to all his relationships, underlying each and every one. He wants it to all add up in his head and he wants to do the adding. And should someone step outside his ciphers, the circle his mind has drawn, his trust evaporates.
author: Geoffrey Wood
category: christian-fiction, christianity, god, grimrack, mathematics, relationship, religion, trust

quote: There are two types of people in the world,someone believes in love and someone does not:~>
author: kamal parvez, A girl braked a poor boys heart when he was alone in his city for her .#1
category: cheating, emotion, hate, hurt, love, trust

quote: One reason your wife might not trust your decision making is because she feels as if you don't spend time alone with God or she feels as if your decisions will only benefit you.
author: Shon Hyneman Love And Football How to play on the same team with your spouse

quote: Trust is crazy. You are a risky, risky, God. I didn’t sign up to be Amazing Trust Boy, and I did not sign up for Danger God. You’re flatly not safe…
author: Geoffrey Wood, Leaper: The Misadventures of a Not-Necessarily-Super Hero

quote: Trust that in doing so you will be on your path and the directions will recalculate themselves—just like it does when you key in an address in your satellite navigation or GPRS and then start driving your car. Without moving at all, it can’t tell you where to go, so act you must. The path is lit with the first step.
author: Malti Bhojwani, Don't Think Of a Blue Ball

quote: I may not know what is in store for me. However, I always know how I prefer to respond to my circumstances whatever they may be.
author: Raphael Zernoff
category: circumstances, honesty, raphael-zernoff, response, self-awareness, spirituality, trust, wisdom

quote: God is too good to be unkind and He is too wise to be mistaken. And when we cannot trace His hand, we must trust His heart.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Let there be consistency in whatever you do and whatever you say. If what you think and say is mismatching with what you do, you can’t really be trusted.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream
category: consistency, consistent, do, food-for-thought, improve, improving, israelmore-ayivor, mismatching, say, think, trust, trusted, trustworthy

quote: I can't say I have any confidence in confidence. I have confidence that God is with us in all things, both tender and tough.
author: Jan Karon, Somewhere Safe with Somebody Good

quote: Black and white thinking limits understanding and feedback, two necessary ingredients for successful resolution in creative conflict and successful understanding.
author: David W. Earle
category: black-and-white, change, chaos, communication, control, dysfunctional, families, love, recovery, thinking, trust

quote: Nice is good. It doesn’t sound exciting, but think about it. I think Mr. Perfect would be kind to kids and animals, help old ladies across the street, not insult you when your opinion is different from his. Being nice is so important it’s close to being number one.
author: Linda Howard, Mr. Perfect

quote: Concerning Personal Branding and Social Media
author: Understand that attention came be gained or gamed but trust must be earned

quote: People who are unwilling to talk about deep personal issues do not trust their own emotions.
author: David W. Earle
category: change, chaos, dysfuctional, emotions, families, honest, intimancy, love, recvoery, trust

quote: TRUST"'A soft thread, that could broken while checking it
author: Samar Sudha

quote: The strange part about a person’s lack of trust is that it often comes from not trusting themselves.
author: David W. Earle
category: change, chaos, dysfunctional, dysfunctional-families, love, recovery, trust

quote: TRUST ADJUSTAn act that changes perception can elevate or lower integrity
author: Kamil Ali, Profound Vers-A-Tales
category: adjust, ali, integrity, kamil, kamiltheauthor, perception, philosophy, profound, tales, trust, vers

quote: An enemy of yours is an enemy of mine; an enemy of mine is an enemy of yours; if an enemy of mine is not an enemy of yours, then you're an enemy of mine.
author: John Yang aka Private83

quote: You could tell a lot about someone by the way they carried a secret-by how safe they kept it, how soon they told, the way they acted when they were trying to keep it from spilling out.
author: Jennifer E. Smith

quote: I know that some people disparage you for your lack of knowledge, and I know you may not understand me, Peter, but I wish you could, because you might be the only person who would. I feel that I can tell you anything Peter.
author: Christopher Daniel Mechling, Peter: The Untold True Story
category: friendship, peter-pan, peter-the-wild-boy, true-story, trust, unconditional-love

quote: When you wear a mask, you are not real.
author: David W. Earle
category: change, chaos, dysfunctional, families, love, real, recovery, trust

quote: Lies can build large palaces of sand.....I wanna live in a small hut of trust
author: Dr lijo john

quote: In a Zen retreat we have a format for working with these quicksilver changes: we sit with them, we pay attention to them... Being steady with mindfulness as an anchor for all the changes we go through is the way we practice forbearance. And you can employ this same method anywhere anytime: just pay close attention to the details of what is going on internally and externally. Don't flinch, don't run away. Trust what happens. Take your stand there." (71)
author: Norman Fischer, Sailing Home: Using the Wisdom of Homer's Odyssey to Navigate Life's Perils and Pitfalls

quote: Honoring your word is the fiber from which trust is built.
author: David W. Earle
category: chaos, dysfunctional, dysfunctional-families, families, love, recovery, self-esteem-honor, trust

quote: I don't trust words. I trust actions
author: Ain Eineziz

quote: The thing is: you might be right to trust someone at one point, but they can change.""+ in between they must be drifting from trustworthy to not. But you can't tell how far they've drifted until it's too late.
author: J.J. Abrams, S.
category: change, drifting, loss-of-trust, relationship, relationships, trust

quote: In that moment I’m able to accept the inevitability of how I feel, though not with joy. I need to talk to someone. I need to trust someone. And for whatever reason, I know, I know it’s her.
author: Veronica Roth, Four: A Divergent Story Collection

quote: If you build the faith to trust a friend as God, then your heart can never be broken.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: believe, broken-heart, certainty, confidence, deep, faith, friend, friendship, god, hope, loving-someone, profound, trust, undying-love

quote: I'm a cactus but I will only offer you flowers.
author: Huseyn Raza
category: gift, hurt, life, love, sacrifice, trust

quote: To be affirming and encouraging of others requires vulnerability on your part.
author: -Shandel Slaten

quote: The man who cannot obey God cannot say that he loves or trusts his Master. If God knows best then how dare we interfere with His will?
author: Alan de Jager

quote: I listened to God and to my husband, not the the enemy's whispers, not to other people's opinions.
author: Lynn Austin, Pilgrimage: My Journey to a Deeper Faith in the Land Where Jesus Walked

quote: Always trust your instinct! If you just close your eyes, talk to God and listen you can always hear the truth
author: Tammy Johnson

quote: Keep your handkerchief neat, and then you can be trusted with a bigger clothe. If you can’t manage few minutes, you are likely to waste 24 hours no matter how many times it’s given to you!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
category: 24, 24-hours, big, bigger, brand, clean, cloth, clothe, days, excuses, faithful, food-for-thought, handkerchief, hours, israelmore-ayivor, large, largers, little-things, manage, management, minutes, mistrust, neat, personal-branding, procrastination, small-things, start-small, trust, waste

quote: A true leader doesn't lead it's pack but gets followed by those who respect.
author: Noa.C.Kings

quote: We must allow people the space and time of discovery, and trust in all that is to come.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
category: allowance, discovery, knowing, space, time, trust

quote: Fatuous words I don't trust you I trust silenceMore than beauty more than anythingA festival of understanding
author: František Halas

quote: You do not have to be so serious about everything and everyone. Trust yourself. Trust your own guidance and do not take everyone's 'interesting opinions' so personally.
author: Raphael Zernoff, I Am
category: guidance, opinions, spirituality, trust, trusting-oneself, wisdom

quote: Humble leaders trust more easily because they realize that the world does not rest solely on their shoulders.
author: -Shandel Slaten

quote: If you fear the unknown you are certainly not alone. Many of God’s children refuse opportunities to step through doors and into gloriously new territories. They are either too comfortable in life, or unwilling (mind you I did not say unable) to trust Him with the stretching of their faith. “Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.” Hebrews. 11:1 (NKJV)
author: Cheryl Zelenka

quote: Get to the next level by learning the art of investing in people.
author: -Shandel Slaten

quote: There are many paths beyond the rules of limited thinking. Trust your instincts!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Trust others and you will be more trusted.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: My father wrote: "Always question where your loyalties lie. The people you trust will expect it, your greatest enemies will desire it, and those you treasure the most, will, without fail, abuse it.
author: Emily Thorne
category: abuse, enemy, loyalty, revenge, revenge-tv-series, trust

quote: Beautiful people, things are to easy for them. They don't know how to survive in this world. Somebody's ugly, or even plain, normal-looking, that means they got to work twice as hard for things. For anything. Just to get peple to listen to 'em, or take 'em serious. So yeah. I don't trust beautiful people.
author: Cassandra Rose Clarke, The Assassin's Curse

quote: Trust is a difficult thing, whether it's finding the right people to trust...Or trusting the right people will do the wrong thing. But trusting your heart...is the riskiest thing of all.In the end,the only person we can truly trust... is ourself.
author: Emily Thorne

quote: In a race between danger and indecision, the difference between life and death comes down to confidence. Faith in our abilities, certainty in ourselves and the trust we put in others.
author: Emily Thorne
category: certainty, confidence, danger, death, faith, indecision, life, revenge, revenge-tv-series, trust

quote: DON'T TELL YOUR SECRETS.A whisper can betray you.DON'T EVER STOP.They will always find you.DON'T TRUST ANYONE.Not even yourself.
author: Michelle Gagnon, Don't Turn Around
category: betray, experiment, persefone, run, secrets, trust, whisper

quote: I had a dream about you. In my dreams you are always different, perhaps even more real to me. How can I explain this to you? It seems like in my dreams I envision parts of you that you prefer keep under surface. You hide from me, as if there was something to hide. You push me away, in fear. Now, I know you are not afraid of me, but that you can’t trust yourself, since it’s beyond your control. I know it’s frightening to love someone that much. I know it because I am afraid, too. And I just wish that for once, we would be afraid together.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic, Dreaming is for lovers
category: dreaming, dreams, fear, hidden, relationships, trust

quote: You are far too amazing to be someone's backup. You're someone's first choice.
author: Chris Burkmenn
category: believe, boy-friend, dating, divorce, faith, first, friends, girl-friend, god, jesus, life, life-quotes, lonely, love, relationships, right, trust

quote: Wesley's touch lingers on my skin. His music echoes through my head. I remind myself as I scrub my skin that we are both liars and con artists. That we will always have secrets, some that bind us and some that cut between us, slicing us into pieces.
author: Victoria Schwab, The Unbound
category: con-artists, friendship, liars, love, people, relationships, secrets, the-unbound, trust

quote: To successfully create illusion, the first thing you need is trust, but to perfect an illusion, the false reality most appear as authentic as the one it hides. Careful attention must be paid to every detail. The slightest of imperfections can, like a pin to a balloon, burst the illusion . . . and the truth behind the illusion becomes revealed.
author: Emily Thorne
category: detail, false-reality, illusion, imperfections, revenge, revenge-tv-series, trust

quote: You have permission to walk away from anything that doesn't feel right. Trust your instincts and listen to your inner-voice — it's trying to protect you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
category: evolve, instincts, listening, protectiveness, teaching, trust

quote: Love is like candy floss. you crave it and it looks very promising, but if you try to satisfy your hunger with it, there is nothing. Only a sweet aftertaste - if you're lucky.
author: Lynn Austin, Hidden Places

quote: Trusting no man as his friend, he could not recognize his enemy when the latter actually appeared.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne, The Scarlet Letter
category: betrayal, enemy, friend, irony, mistrust, trust

quote: Pain of the past never goes away, you just find a way to deal with it. And in the future....... all the promise it holds.... that's what keeps you moving forward, and out of the darkness.
author: Samantha Towle, Trouble
category: contemporary-romance, favorite-book, favorite-lines, favorite-quotes, jordan, let-go, love, mia, must-read, pain, promises, samantha-towle, trouble, trust

quote: Trust isn’t something you can just one day decide to have. Trust cannot be fabricated out of thin air, no matter how one’s will is set to it. Trust has to be earned. And there’s the tragedy of it, the dependence on the other, who is often not up for the challenge, poisoned as he is by the modern individualistic and time-is-money mindset. And thus trust is losing ground more and more until one day it will turn into something rare and obscure and this world has become a severly violent and lonely place, ruled by mistrust and disconnection.
author: Anna Jae

quote: I wonder if I should believe what she says. But when you're not strong in yourself, anyone can tell you anything and you'll fall for it.
author: Sachin Kundalkar, Cobalt Blue

quote: Inviting someone to work for pay is a sacred privilege and a trust. It must be regarded a high honor to be able to give another person work, and neither employer nor employee should abuse this relationship
author: Judy Frankel
category: abuse, employee, employer, privilege, relationship, sacred, trust, work

quote: He gave me the one thing he's never given to anyone before..He gave me his heart, and his trust.And in return, I gave him the same right back....
author: Samantha Towle, Trouble
category: contemporary-romance, favorite-lines, favorite-quotes, heart, must-read, samantha-towle, trouble, trust

quote: It takes a strong person to stand up to his or her fate and overcome the obstacles that stand in the way of freedom and success, but I believe in you.
author: Pax Prentiss, The Alcoholism and Addiction Cure
category: addiction, addiction-treatment, alcohol-rehab, bravery, drug-rehab, fate, passages-malibu, passages-rehab, passages-treatment-center, pax-prentiss, trust

quote: If you trust, I'm the Truth.
author: Himanshu Chhabra

quote: Never trust an Italian. The Nazis did that, and look where it got them.
author: Paul Murray, Skippy Dies

quote: Trust is an act of the mind, while obedience is an act of the hands and feet.
author: David Jeremiah, What Are You Afraid Of?

quote: Insurance business is about promises and trust. It is about delivering to the customer in times of need and if this cannot be imbibed in a professional neither him nor the industry will succeed.
author: Tapan Singhel

quote: Bad lovers face to face in the morning Shy apologies and polite regrets Slow dances that left no warning of Outraged glances and indiscreet yawning Good manners and bad breath get you nowhere Even presidents have newspaper lovers Ministers go crawling under covers She's no angel He's no saint They're all covered up with white washed grease paint And you say...Chorus: The teacher never told you anything but white lies But you never see the lies And you believe Oh you know you have been captured You feel so civilized And you look so pretty in your new lace sleevesThe salty lips of the socialite sisters With their continental fingers that have never seen working blisters Oh I know they've got their problems I wish I was one of them They say daddy's coming home soon With his sergeant stripes and his Empire mug and spoonNo more fast buck And when are they gonna learn their lesson When are they gonna stop all of these victory processions And you say...
author: Elvis Costello

quote: Strict TimeThere's a hand on a wire that leads to my mouth I can hear you knocking but I'm not coming out Don't want to be a puppet or a ventriloquist 'Cause there's no ventilation on a critical list Fingers creeping up my spine are not mine to resist Strict timeChorus: Toughen up, toughen up Keep your lip buttoned up Strict timeOh the muscles flex and the fingers curl And a cold sweat breaks out on the sweater girl Strict time Oh he's all hands, don't touch that dial The courting cold wars weekend witch trial Strict time All the boys are straight laced and the girls are frigid The talk is two-faced and the rules are rigid 'cause it's strict time Strict timeYou talk in hushed tones, I talk in lush tones Try to look Italian through the musical Valium Strict time Thinking of grand larceny Smoking the everlasting cigarette of chastity Cute assistants staying alive More like a hand job than the hand jive Strict time
author: Elvis Costello

quote: We are hard-wired to engage with those we trust, and this hard-wiring has led to a constant push for greater interaction and connection on the Web.
author: David Amerland, Google+ Hangouts for Business: How to use Google+ Hangouts to Improve Brand Impact, Build Business and Communicate in Real-Time

quote: It's too good, she is. She wants to find the good in others, and sometimes her way of finding that is to trust them, hoping she'll not be disappointed but she sometimes is.
author: Claire Keegan

quote: Well the other thing about lying is that the liar is banking on two things when telling the lie. They are hoping that the person being lied to is gullible enough to believe, and it’s also not even that they think they are gullible, it’s that they know the person they are lying to well enough that they know the person won’t push it any further because they know the person they are lying to wants to believe the lie.
author: Garry Crystal, And When the Arguing's Over...

quote: Trust your instincts, love with your whole heart, forgive, and never take anything for granted.
author: Terri Haynes Roach

quote: Love has something to do with recognition, We can be fascinated by the unknown, we can be attracted by it, but love is something that grows, slowly, in an atmosphere of trust.
author: Peter Høeg, The Quiet Girl
category: attracter, attraction, fascinated, fascination, growing, grows, love, recognition, slow, slowly, trust, unknown

quote: Trustworthy is earned not bought.
author: Dee Dee Artner
category: attitude, business, entrepreneurship, integrity, life, life-lessons, lifestyle, millionaire, millionaire-focus, millionaire-mind, millionaire-mindset, peak-performance, people, performance, productivity, relationships, self-development, social, success, transformation, trust, trustworthy

quote: We were perfectly decorous together. It took the will of both of us. I trusted him with me, and myself with him.
author: Ronald Frame, Havisham

quote: You cannot trust a person who only has new friends.
author: J.A. Perez

quote: Can trust be trusted?
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, A Failure In Trust

quote: Those who would abuse your trust for their own benefit can do it well, but only one time.
author: J.A. Perez

quote: The thing about lying is it’s like creating your own world, controlling your own little world. A tiny innocent, or as some people call them white lie, can lead eventually to the break-up of a relationship. If the other person in the relationship knows the person has lied, no matter if it was with good intentions, then it’s the beginning of the breakdown of trust. A profile or a picture is being continually formed of the two people in a relationship, and the lies, big and small, add to that profile.
author: Garry Crystal, And When the Arguing's Over...

quote: An intangible substance, make up the world around us. But ironically, must still only foolishly trust, in what they can see or touch.
author: Sovereign Voice

quote: True love can’t exist without trust.
author: Norma Gail, Land of My Dreams

quote: Trust and condemnation work hand in hand for both work on the concept of experience, of knowing it, observing it, realizing it, understanding it and finally accepting it in either of the two categories for the root remains the same 'Expectation'. Expectation leads one to think that 'I would achieve something if trust is there' and when the expectation is not achieved the process of condemning begins. Imagine a situation where the basis of doing something is not expectation but remains mystical in nature. This is a state of liberation from the most difficult process as without Expectation, Trust is absent and Condemnation ceases to exist. This is a pure state for it helps one to unravel the human nature and the neutral mindest, openness emerges leading one to grow more and more within.
author: Maitreya Rudrabhayananda
category: condemnation, expectation, grow, growth, human-nature, openness, pure, trust

quote: Love could be instant and unconditional but trust develops through time. You may not trust wholeheartedly while loving someone unconditionally.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Purge everything that's holding you back. Whatever it is you feel you are being deprived of, trust the limitation serves to bring you more of what you want.
author: Holly Lynn Payne, DAMASCENA - The Tale of Roses and Rumi
category: deprive, doing-what-you-love, holding-you-back, limitations, love, purge, trust

quote: Trust is easy to give but hard to keep also it's hard to achieve but easy to lose
author: Russ

quote: No matter what you’re facing, embrace life in trust and contentment based on your faith in Jesus.
author: Elizabeth George
category: base, content, embrace, face, faith, jesus, life, trust

quote: Trust in many ways is a much greater compliment than love
author: Nasif.E.Ridoy

quote: ⁯It is not something you can tell by looking at a person, but trust is always being increased or decreased as you interact with a person.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: Trust is a two way street.
author: Krishna Sagar

quote: Impact of telling a lie: The day it is spoken to the day it is caught.
author: Neeraj Bhanot

quote: If you desire something, and trust that it will come to you, then you will have it.
author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge
category: desire, inspirational, inspire, motivate, motivational-quote, no-limits, trust

quote: A leader that doesn't sympathize have a loose strings and a wicked heart.
author: Lendon

quote: A leader that doesn't sympathize have a loose string and wicked heart.
author: Lendon

quote: What you read between the covers of your Bible is wisdom for a lifetime, rock-solid, forever truth—truth you can stand on, live by, and trust…forever.
author: Elizabeth George
category: author, bible, blessed, christian, cover, faith, forever, lifetime, live, read, reading, rock, solid, trust, wisdom

quote: I expect nothing of man, and disown the race. The only folly is expecting what is never attained; man is most contemptible when compared with his own pretensions. It is better to laugh at man from outside the universe, than to weep for him within.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
category: expectation, folly, hope, laugh, man, mankind, misanthropy, race, trust, weep

quote: But one creature said at last, "I am tired of clinging. Though I cannot see it with my eyes, I trust that the current knows where it is going. I shall let go, and let it take me where it will. Clinging, I shall die of boredom.
author: Richard Bach, Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: A steely look of anger flared in my mother’s eyes, and I thought, just maybe, I was leaving her in good hands after all. Her own.
author: Rick Riordan, The Lightning Thief
category: backbone, female, girl-power, independence, individuality, trust

quote: Trust is the bedrock of intimacy
author: it is the ability to rely on someone because you believe that he or she has your best interest at heart.
category: Chana Levitan, I Only Want to Get Married Once: Dating Secrets for Getting It Right the First Time

quote: When you don’t understand what is happening, you need to wait, trust God, and rest in His care. He is always faithful to His own.
author: Jim George, One-Minute Insights for Men
category: care, christian, faith, faithful, god, happen, men, own, rest, trust, understand, wait

quote: How much can you really trust the promise of a suicidal father?
author: Ruth Ozeki, A Tale for the Time Being

quote: She was not the sort of woman guys settle for. She was the one they lust after and strive for. She was the one who ruins other people's relationships simply by existing, but she will always be surmounted as guys come to realize the virtues of the approachable girl next door. She was, in brief, too pretty to be trusted or had.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Artificial Gods

quote: Each time you turn your life issues over to God and allow Him to lead, you build trust in Him.
author: Elizabeth George, Prayers to Calm Your Heart: Finding the Path to More Peace and Less Stress
category: allow, author, build, christian, god, issues, lead, life, over, time, trust, turn

quote: In the end, Mothers are always right. No one else tells the truth.
author: Randy Susan Meyers, The Murderer's Daughters
category: advice, fact, family, inspirational, inspire, lies, life, love, meanings, mom, mothers, parents, true, true-love, trust, truth

quote: The apologist is most entrusted with apologetics when capable of arguing his opponent's position better than his opponent.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: apologetics, apologist, arguments, capable, debates, defense, offense, opponent, trust, understanding

quote: You have so much love in you. Trust your firends and family. They're all you have, but they're precious, the most important part of your life.
author: Deb Baker, Murder Talks Turkey

quote: Great leaders build trust from their team because the leader is willing to put his/her people “first.” Once the team believes that, they will put their leader, and the company, first as well.
author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people
category: company, leader, leadership, relationships, success, team, trust

quote: This is not new: people do business with people they like, know and trust. Taking that axiom in to account, would YOU trust YOU?
author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

quote: In order for a person to be able to “turn our lives and our wills” over requires something very difficult for a spiritually wounded person to accomplish - Trust. Yet, to accomplish this step, trust of the spirit must be present.
author: David W. Earle

quote: Faith is evidence unseen and never seen, trust is gained from evidence seen and understood.
author: Gary J. Spaulding

quote: I have learnt that trusting another takes a leap of faith
author: taking a risk and putting emotions on the line. This is in the hope that the other will accept and understand you.

quote: Toklo raked his companions with a hard glance. “Don’t risk your own safety.”“I bet you’ll risk yours,” Lusa said, aware once again of how deeply she trusted this bear.“That’s what I’m here for,” Toklo retorted.
author: Erin Hunter, Spirits in the Stars

quote: I am very happy with all my friends and co-workers, because if they don’t remember me in their happy times or in their success. However, they never forget me if they are in a problem or need my help…
author: Nutan Bajracharya
category: co-workers, faith, forget, friends, happy, lesson, life, problem, time, trust

quote: When you trust someone, you don't need to know everything.
author: Bob Goff, Love Does: Discover a Secretly Incredible Life in an Ordinary World
category: faith, inspirational, love, love-does, planning, trust

quote: This is what the Others have done to us. You can’t band together to fight without trust. And without trust, there was no hope. How do you rid the Earth of humans? Rid the humans of their humanity.
author: Rick Yancey, The 5th Wave
category: aliens, cassie-sullivan, hope, human, humanity, trust

quote: It was all about money. Dirty, bloody money. It can come and go so easily. They don't see that life is what's important. Love, friendship, trust, respect, a daily routine, someone to grow old with, siblings to cherish, family, a home; things people don't give a damn about until they lose them, things money can't bring back.
author: Cristiane Serruya, Trust: Betrayed

quote: No one trusts a model except the man who wrote it; everyone trusts an observation, except the man who made it.
author: Harlow Shapley
category: humor, model, observation, paradox, science, trust

quote: For me, doing the actual work to fulfill the vision is the easy part. It's the emotional journey that I go through as I am free falling into the unknown that is the hard part. But each time I jump, I'm learning to trust that God will continue to guide me and help me to land safely.
author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir
